content: ~9 circumference 3 half_double_crochet over chain space 4 half_double_crochet in each of next 5 dcs rounds 1-3 as per itty bitty pattern 36 double_crochet after round 3 5 half_double_crochet over chain space round 4 hdcstndst then half_double_crochet all around and then slip_stitch into hdcstndst 36 half_double_crochet 6 repeat steps 4 and 5 six times rounds 5-7 as per itty bitty pattern round 7-9 except repeat 4 times instead of 6 7 half_double_crochet in each of the last 2 dcs round 8 hdcstndst then half_double_crochet all around including over chain 1 spaces and then slip_stitch 8 slip_stitch into the hdcstndst from step 1 into hdcstndst 35 half_double_crochet stitch count 48 half_double_crochet note if a shorter length beanie is required substitute single_crochet single_crochet stitches for half_double_crochet stitches in rounds 4 and 8 slip_stitch finishing round optional slip_stitch in every stitch around careful to maintain same gauge as previous double_crochet round 10 refer to the crochet fix spin stitch youtube video for those of you who find crab stitch difficult to work this is an alternative option that results in the same finish page | 13
